task_summary: Robot arm detects the towel and performs a sequential approach motion above and toward the towel, aligning itself as the final preparatory step for interaction.

task_long_description.overview: This episode showcases a bimanual xArm robot tasked with reaching a pink towel positioned on a green mat. The robot starts from a home position above the workspace and proceeds through visual search and detection, followed by vertical and lateral positioning above the towel and alignment. No grasp or manipulation is performed; the primary goal is to reach and align to the towel, as evidenced by the arm's endpoints in the frames.
preconditions: Workspace is clear except for towel and mat
stepwise_plan: Check if the towel is visible; if not, scan workspace
Move arm above detected towel (pre-approach vertical offset)
Approach and align robot end-effector to towel position
success_criteria: Robot end-effector reaches a position above the towel within defined tolerance
No collision with workspace or towel
failure_and_recovery: Failure: Towel not detected —> Retry scan up to 3 times
Failure: Alignment out of tolerance —> Abort and notify
Failure: Unexpected obstacle —> Abort and retreat
task_long_description.termination: Tree terminates when the robot is positioned and aligned above the towel, or aborts after action/scan failures.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the towel is visible before continuing
Performs line-pattern scan to find towel if not visible
Moves end-effector above towel, offset in z
Approaches and aligns robot to towel within tight tolerance

failure_modes: Towel not found after scan attempts
recovery_strategy: Retry scan for towel up to 3 times on visibility failure
Abort or repeat DetectObject if detection fails
Abort on collision risk or alignment failure
assumptions: Instruction suggests reaching the towel; frames show only approach, no physical grasp or manipulation
Robot is bimanual but only one arm is consistently active
No indication in frames of grasp/transfer/place; tree omits those per evidence
Offset_z for MoveAbove set to nominal 0.05 as towel height is minimal

expected_success_criteria: Arm reaches and aligns above towel
